short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with YouTube videos through AI: ask questions, summarize and search for keywords spoken in the video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you find yourself intrigued by some Youtube titles, but usually have no time to watch the video to learn the answer? 

Do you want to be able to quickly extract information from a Youtube video?

Owlie is an AI-powered browser extension that serves as a knowledge extraction tool for Youtube videos. It allows the user to interact with the content of videos through following features:
- asking questions about the video
- summarizing videos
- extracting transcript, where clicking a sentence jumps to the timestamp it's spoken
- finding keywords / phrases within video's content

Keep in mind that the answers accord to the video's content and that Owlie is not aware of your previous questions.

If you end up liking the extension and feeling generous, please do consider donating :)
https://ko-fi.com/owliext

Github: https://github.com/martinezpl/owlie-yt-addon
